entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Mangled code in CngCommon throws away errors #101520
  • ComClassGenerator doesn't find interfaces when the generated code is copied to a source file and GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute is removed #101519
  • Check new Guid at compile time if available #101517
  • CborReader should support reading from streams #101516
  • Verify spin-waiting defaults before yield normalization occurs for ARM processors #101506
    Future
  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_AltSvc_Test_Http3 timeouts #101505
  • iOS test failing with exit code 22 (disabled device) #101502
  • [browser][WBT] SignalRClientTests.SignalRPassMessageWasmBrowser - Connection closed #101497
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Retrofit XmlNodeList to implement IReadOnlyList #101496
  • [mono] Intrinsify Unsafe API's #101495
    Future
  • Microsoft Speech Synthesizer defualt female voice lexicon file recognition #101487
  • Settings for a WPF app goes into new folders for every publish of click-once #101486
  • PerformanceCounterCategory.ReadCategory() is taking larger memory allocation #101485
  • .net maui with .net8 has sql-connection-issues when using dapper #101484
  • [wasm] Resolve issues on `runtime-wasm` pipeline and run it on rolling builds #101482
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] AOT null function or function signature mismatch #101481
    9.0.0
  • AccessViolationException on macOS in Asn1Tag.TryDecode #101479
  • Arm64/Sve: Some misc items about SVE Vector Length #101477
  • Arm64/Sve Test: Inputs for LoadVector API test #101475
  • System.Text.Json.Tests.Utf8JsonWriterTests.WritingTooDeep failure #101470
    9.0.0
  • Stack overflow in WasmTestOnChrome-System.Runtime.Tests #101467
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: What's the future of dynamic code execution, AOT, JIT and interpreter in .NET-based mobile apps? #101466
  • Plan to migrate to zlib-ng #101465
    9.0.0
  • WasmTestOnChrome-System.Runtime.Tests.WorkItemExecution fails with exit code 3221226505 #101464
    9.0.0
  • Timeout in System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests #101463

Closed

  • profiler\multiple test failed #100114
  • TypeNameParser API #97566
    9.0.0
  • [8.0][wasm] Failure in System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.TensorPrimitivesTests.RunForEachSpecialValue #94891
    8.0.x
  • [8.0] Failure in Wasi.Build.Tests.WasiTemplateTests.ConsoleBuildAndRunForDifferentOutputPaths #94537
    8.0.x
  • [8.0] File used by another process in Wasm.Build.Tests.Blazor.SimpleRunTests.BlazorBuildAndRunForDifferentOutputPaths #92805
    9.0.0
  • Failing test `tracing/runtimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource.cmd` on mono/osx #95669
    Future
  • Mono interpreter leg timing out in CI on a variety of tests #99940
  • [wasm] 'emcmake' is not recognized as an internal or external command, #100973
  • System.Tests.DateTimeTests.ParseExact_Span_ValidInput_Succeeds #101072
    9.0.0
  • [browser] `System.Buffers.ArrayPool.Tests.ArrayPoolUnitTests` fails with out of memory #101436
  • System.Text.Json.Tests timeout in Linux-Debug-x64-Mono_Interpreter_Debug-Ubuntu.2204.Amd64.Open #101508
  • Stale async task when flooding the network with too many async http requests #101411
  • Auto-referenced packages gets added to packages.lock.json for Microsoft.NET.Sdk.BlazorWebAssembly #100082
  • GetCustomAttributes throws Exception when attribute contains a type defined in a dynamic assembly. #101343
  • Make mutable generic collection interfaces implement read-only collection interfaces #31001
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT\HardwareIntrinsics\Arm\Sve\Sve_ro\Sve_ro.cmd #100366
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: New AssemblyName-like type for TypeName parsing #100867
    9.0.0
  • [mono] Interpreter generates bad code for Scalar<T>.Equals #101222
  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_AltSvc_Test_Http3.AltSvc_Header_Upgrade_Success failing with timout #101503
  • Timeout in System.Text.Json.Tests.Utf8JsonWriterTests.WriteNumbers #101193
    9.0.0
  • Tracking issue for remaining AssemblyBuilder.Save work in .NET 9 #92975
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Enumerable.SequenceEqual #101448
  • SPMI for Arm64 failing asserting for `argReg == argNode->GetRegNum()` #101070
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Determine Reference Type Nullability during runtime #101438
  • Cookie expiration uses local time instead of UTC #95603
    9.0.0
  • cdac src/coreclr/runtime.proj(96,5): error MSB3073 #101471
  • Update the runtime to have deterministic floating-point to integer conversions #61885
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable repackaging of NETStandard 2.1 Targeting Pack #101518
    Servicing-consider, area-Setup
  • Handle case where falseValue is contained #101515
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • When initializing Lock in NativeAOT, get the processor count directly instead of using Environment #101514
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix Lock spin-waiting on single-proc machines #101513
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • Switch DirectoryControl to use AsnWriter, AsnDecoder #101512
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [Testing] Backport #92901 to release/8.0-staging #101510
    needs-area-label
  • [mono] Check if type is compatible right before emitting box #101509
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add missing generic constraints #101504
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Notify the debugger of a cross-thread dependency in Lock #101501
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • Reapply keyword `params` #101499
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Memory, 9.0.0
  • Restrict indentation size in JsonWriterOptions theories. #101498
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Extend mono_gsharedvt_constrained_call for static calls and handle nullable value types #101491
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.x
  • Read EnableWriteXorExecute from runtimeConfig #101490
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add runtime test for static gsharedvt methods #101489
    test-enhancement, area-VM-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Add some R2R missing codes. #101480
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [mono][gc] Remove reliance on regs/stack scanning in some cases #101478
    area-GC-mono
  • [mono][wasm]Enable test case in aot mode #101476
    NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Reduce generic specialized code in console formatters #101474
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • JIT: Implement greedy RPO-based block layout #101473
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • optimize the store/restore for calleeSavedRegs. #101472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update ICollection<T> usage to IReadOnlyCollection<T> where applicable #101469
    area-System.Collections, 9.0.0
  • Bump main pre-release version to 5 #101468
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add PipeWriter overloads to Json #101461
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Optimize bundled_resources key creation, hashing, and comparison #101460
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono

Merged

  • Disable most of S.T.Json trimming tests on AOT the right way #101418
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • TypeName parsing API #100094
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Add managed blocking info for lock and monitor waits #101192
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • Arm64/Sve: Predicated Abs, Predicated/UnPredicated Add, Conditional Select #100743
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-arm64-sve
  • Refresh our "dev-innerloop" pipeline jobs #101304
    area-Infrastructure
  • Disable terminal logger experience for dotnet test in manual tests. #100333
    area-System.Console
  • Fix checks to accommodate register wraparounds in multi-reg ops #101430
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update EOL versions in release/8.0-staging #101073
    Servicing-approved, test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure
  • Add more logging to HTTP3 and QUIC code #101449
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix a compiler error on alpine-arm64 #101206
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix deadlock in TestUtilities.TestEventListener #101493
    area-System.Net
  • Disable System.Text.Json.Tests suite on interp with debug runtime #101483
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [browser] More meaningful code in browser template #101287
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix Http3LoopbackServer sending GOAWAY cancelling completed request/response. #101447
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Disable frequently failing tests #101439
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Change all Cookie localized DateTime logic with Universal alternative #100489
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Run System.Net.Http trimming tests with AOT #101416
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix condition for disabling extra checks in verify_class_overrides #101445
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Simplify managed MetadataImport creation #101353
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Expose the `ConvertToIntegerNative` APIs #100993
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Make mutable generic collection interfaces implement read-only collection interfaces #95830
    area-System.Collections, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution

Updated

  • [cdac] Read/store globals from contract descriptor #101450
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add `hostfxr_resolve_frameworks_for_runtime_config` for resolving runtime frameworks #101451
    area-Host
  • Share return value handling in trim analysis #101398
    needs-area-label
  • Add option to change SVE vector length for current and children processes #101295
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Fix 97272 #99818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Add SwiftError support for Swift reverse pinvokes #101122
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove unnecessary indirect use of managed wcslen from AppContext setup #101318
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Implement Activity.AddLink #101381
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix `LLVMArgWasmVtypeAsScalar` when a method doesn't set its return value #101299
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Sve.LoadVector*ZeroExtendTo*() #101291
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Add test for boxing byreflike fail. #101458
    test-enhancement, area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Fix ConvertDllsToWebCil stack dump on bad input to be error message with input path #101162
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [WASI] update SDK 22 and wasmtime 19.0.2 #101392
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • Tensor wave 1 API's. #101196
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Properly disable S.L.Queryable trimming tests with AOT #101417
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] UnsafeAccessor: Add support for non-generic method instance #101442
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Reloading sources in ConfigurationManager should not dispose IConfigurationSources, only providers #100641
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Don't use SyncTextWriter in single-threaded wasm builds #101221
    arch-wasm, area-CoreLib-mono
  • Remove distros versions calculation #100580
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Create separate attribute for warning behavior differences #101220
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • enable dependabot for github actions #101406
    area-Meta
  • [browser] firefox testing #100697
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add support for Sve.UnzipEven/Odd & Sve.ZipHighLow #101294
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [Test Only] Async interruptions on safepoints with callsite fixups #99339
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Fix data race leading to a deadlock when opening QuicStream #101250
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add CreateWhileLessThan* #100949
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Fix big endian issue in Interlocked test cases #101429
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Remove global spinlock for EH stacktrace #100427
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Use BigMul in BigMul #100918
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • JIT: Rewrite initial parameter frame layout in terms of new ABI info #101340
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Add unchecked version of stelem_ref interpreter opcode #99829
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono][interp] Add missing GC wbarriers for static field stores with hotreload enabled #100775
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Count*BitElements #101188
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • JIT: Check more invariants on ABI info and fix some arm32 bugs #101372
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update System.Threading.Channels dependency #101101
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-24
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Re-enable the `DotNetJsApi` smoke test #2558
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: package publishing broken #2539

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Resolve some warnings, replace some `std` types with Jit types #2562
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Re-enable DotnetJs smoke test #2561
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to build project which depends on package containing pre-compressed static web assets #40413
  • [NETSDKE2E] Running dotnet test in the mstest project will generate a redundant file on Linux and Mac #40398

Closed

  • Cannot update/upgrade from https://packages.microsoft.com/ubuntu/22.04/prod #40400

PullRequests

Created

  • Copy Installer Pipeline ymls #40420
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • feat: Add support for updatedTypes in metadata updates #40416
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2437776 #40397
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Move Microsoft.DotNet.Tools.Tests.Utilities.Tests into Microsoft.DotNet.Cli.Utils.Tests #40417
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Preview 5 branding #40394
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Mark UseWindowsThreadPool as feature switch #40372
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • [Wasm] Remove workarounds #39689
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #40364
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #40324
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • More workload set fixes #40266
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Aspire #40111
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [Issue #37237 #19650] Dotnet Cli Feature: `dotnet tool update --all` Updating all tools with one command #38996
    Area-Tools
  • Add repository policy to label and close stale issues #40226
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Installer to SDK merge - Phase 1 #38804
    untriaged
  • Ignore generic type parameter names when matching #40359
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Fix reporter encoding #40391
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #40369
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-24
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Higher Kinded Polymorphism / Generics on Generics #339
    Backlog
  • Lightweight documentation comment syntax #2394

PullRequests

Created

  • Update params-collections.md based on recent LDM decision #8077
  • Dictionary expressions: add resolutions for open questions from LDM-2024-03-11 #8074

Updated

  • Create partial-properties.md #8065
  • Update ref-in-async speclet #8056
  • Add detailed design to clarify the field keyword spec and incorporate all LDM decisions #8069

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Implement telemetry events for telemetry funnel in C# devkit #73224
  • Workspace diagnostic LSP request when modifying a TypeScript file in VS #73222
  • ref discard produces nullability warning #73214
  • Roslyn codegen impacting array variance exception behavior #73215
  • CS3006 false-positive on operators with `in` keyword #73212
  • Force Type Convert QuickAction Bug #73211

Closed

  • Update msbuild reference package to get clean on scanners #72812
  • Expose IPropertySymbol.AssociatedField #42355
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-34823.102 #73204

PullRequests

Created

  • Add asset syncing test. #73225
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Non-array params collections are not applicable in expanded form in C# 12 and below. #73223
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Enable Arcade V3 publishing in PR Validation #73221
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • WatchHotReloadService: Reset session id in EndSession #73219
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Move memory-mapped-text storage system to use the new pattern introduced for memory-mapped-stream storage. #73218
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.9 #73217
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #73208
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • [WIP] Switch Roslyn protocol types to System.Text.Json serialization #73207
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Require AddExplicitInterfaceImplementation for adding a type that implements member explicitly #73206
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Fix LSP File watching so it correctly reports the baseUri if there's a trailing slash #73203
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix issue where we could get assets back in a different order than expected #73220
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix issue with frozen-partial snapshots having incomplete references. #73205
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Switch to an ILookup as we want to lookup diagnostics by document id easily. #73213
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Rename a few types. #73216
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update referenced MSBuild to 17.3.4 #73113
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Cache diagnostics produced during workspace pull, to avoid unnecessary computations #73202
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [17.8] Migrate official builds to 1ES template #73210
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Check UI context before trying to initialize cohosting #73172
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Cache diagnostics produced during workspace pull, to avoid unnecessary computations #73201
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Enable hosts to provide custom assembly resolution #73185
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement MEF based pull diagnostics #73073
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Specially handle more scenarios for type parameters with 'allows ref struct' constraint #73111
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Partial properties: merging declarations and emit of simple cases #72999
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Partial Properties
  • Allow unsafe blocks in iterators #73046
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
  • [C#] Make interpolated strings including string or char constants as optimized as `+` operator (for string type) #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Clean up Razor EA #73040
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Promote "Convert to interpolated string" to an analyzer/fixer (#68469) #73008
    Area-Analyzers, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fix ApiExplorer metadata for FormFiles in MVC actions #55349
    9.0-preview5
  • Perf improvement: mvc, plaintext #55344
  • React to https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/pull/101461 (System.IO.Pipelines) #55342
  • When using CreatedAtAction and Guid as Id, I get "System.InvalidOperationException: No route matches the supplied values." #55338
  • Issue with Icon and DateTime Picker functionality after Implementing Bootstrap Theme #55336
  • IHttpSysRequestTimingFeature.Timestamp is empty #55334
  • Security Claims not Identifying Expiration Time. #55333
  • HybridCache - rename RemoveKeyAsync and RemoveTagAsync to "By" #55332
  • Forbidden/403 responses should not show a querystring with ReturnUrl #55330
  • Redirect On Signout without making your own Controller #55329
  • Reduce boiler plate code for getting the current user in a Blazor component #55327
    .NET 10 Planning

Closed

  • Context name for EditForms gives error when no error should be given. #55340
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_spring #55331
  • There is no guidance for multiple Identity actions with a transaction #54855
  • UserManager.RefreshSignInAsync throws headers exception #54805
  • Issue with Bootstrap Icon and DateTime Picker functionality in Blazor Server Application #55337
  • [Feature Request] Please consider passing the services registered in the Server to WebAssembly on blazor web app #55325
  • Captured Component reference is not set on a Component when using a Parameter #55317
  • Blazor Component cannot be nested inside a Parent component (using render fragment) if the nested component is interactive #55319
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, fortunes_spring, plainTextEmptyFilter #55257
  • Perf regression: endpoint, plainTextEmptyFilter #55264

PullRequests

Created

  • Add a key management simulator for data protection #55348
    area-dataprotection
  • Add support for updatedTypes in metadata updates #55347
    area-blazor
  • Use built-in OpenAPI support in templates #55343
    area-mvc
  • Set the baggage even when the trace id is not successfully extracted #55341
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • UnixCertificateManager: implement IsTrusted. #55335
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix inheritdoc tag for ObjectPool.Create() #55293
    area-networking, 9.0-preview5
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.4.24224.4 #55345
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 9.0-preview5
  • Quarantine HeartbeatLoopRunsWithSpecifiedInterval #55298
    area-networking, 9.0-preview5
  • Remove AccountLayout.razor from project template #55294
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview5

Updated

  • Allow HTTP2 encoder to split headers across frames #55322
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Fix form handling and add NuGet pkg docs #55321
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • [H/3] Fix code passed into QuicConnection.CloseAsync and QuicStream.Abort #55282
    area-networking
  • Adding accept header to callsites within SignalR #55271
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Change how ANCM recycles app #55288
    Servicing-approved, area-networking, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Handle rejected promises inside incoming Invocation messages #55230
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 8.0.x
  • update project templates use primary constructors #55006
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-ui-rendering

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `clrstack -f` shows no managed names with lldb in .NET 9 #4637
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix SOS unit tests dump generation fixture #4636

Updated

  • Supports collecting GCSettingsEvent for gc-collect profile #4615
  • Add support for new exception trace storage format #4635
    dotnet-sos, 9.0.0
  • [SymbolStore] Add support to index .NET Framework Runtime debugging modules #4616

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CollectionView with GridItemsLayout: Items do not update from DataTemplate Bindings [Android] #22044
  • Control when splash screen ends #22043
  • Android : Border Stroke GradiantBrush can only switch to another gradiantbrush #22042
  • MaskedBehavior from the Toolkit Behaviors is not working properly #22041
  • Maui Android parent view inappropriately creates clipping mask when its opacity is less than 1, cropping out children #22038
  • Memory Leak in Style with Trigger #22036
  • [Android] CarouselView: VirtualView cannot be null here, when clearing and adding items on second navigation #22035
  • iOS : Shell FlyoutItem Tab Selected Icon Color not changing if using Font icons #22032
  • WCF service with DataContract and EnumValues not returning enum values in result #22031
  • This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been marked as requiring author feedback to reproduce the issue but has not had any activity for **4 days**. It will be closed if no further activity occurs **within 3 days of this comment**. If it *is* closed, feel free to comment when you are able to provide the additional information and we will re-investigate. #22030
  • Bypass the certificate security check for localhost makes calls to valid https host throw exception #22029
  • Is there a bug with the picker control? #22028
  • ContentPresenter is not clearing its default Content binding when Content is TemplatedBinded in xaml #22027
  • (iOS) Entrys ignoring textColor-property if text-property set via binding #22025
  • XamlParseException is thrown changing the return type of a BindableProperty using the new modifier and setting it in Style #22024
  • MAUI WebView on iOS is suspended while app is still visible and functioning #22022
  • Error "The type 'NSObject' is defined in an assembly that is not referenced. You must add a reference to assembly 'Xamarin.iOS, Version=0.0.0.0" #22021

Closed

  • ListView is not currently being Garbage Collected #20025
    Backlog
  • [Mac] Light up HideSoftInputOnTapped for Catalyst #21528
    .NET 8 SR4
  • ListView not visible in Android #22037
  • [WinUI] TemplatedItemsList and underlying ListView UI elements are disconnected, creates phantom views. #18401
  • iOS: Space appears between TitleView and Content when Entry is focused. #22026
  • Embeded youtube video doesn't work on iOS (MAUI Blazor Hybrid .NET7, .NET8) #20887
    Backlog
  • [Android] - Font icons and image issue on release #19607
  • Scrollview\CollectionView doesn't scroll #22005

PullRequests

Created

  • [android] use Java primitive `boolean` for `UriImageSource` #22040
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️
  • `Microsoft.Maui-dev.sln` contains an invalid path #22033
    community ✨
  • [XC] Compile "standalone" bindings #22023
    area/Xaml </>

Merged

  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leaks in ListView #22007
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦
  • [iOS] Add UITest for #21806 #21951
    area/navigation 🧭, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, area/controls 🎮, area/testing, control-entry, area/keyboard
  • Add latest .NET9 and .NET8 #22034

Updated

  • [Windows] Implement `IdleSynchronizer` #20630
    platform/windows 🪟
  • [iOS] Implemented PrefersHomeIndicatorAutoHidden, PrefersStatusBarHidden and PreferredStatusBarUpdateAnimation Platform Specifics #20069
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area/platform
  • Navigate Directly to Test #22019
  • [ci] Move to arcade , remove GitInfo and Mono dependencies #21487
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix null reference exception in KeyboardAutoManagerScroll when UIWindow is null #21753
    community ✨, area/keyboard, control-window
  • [iOS] Shell page title fix #20575
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • [iOS] Allow compat iOS buttons to resize image and to respect spacing and padding #21759
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Add .NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid + Web App solution template #21867
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [Testing] Split up current appium tests into separate projects #21908
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [WinUI] Cache gesture event subscriptions #21959
    platform/windows 🪟, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, area/gestures
  • [macOS] Fix crash when setting window properties #21357
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, control-window
  • ContentView and ScrollView also need to handle InputTransparent #21025
    area/layout 🔲
  • Fix BoxView not rendering when is hidden on start #21960
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Fixed creation of the CustomTabsActivityManager #22018
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [Docs] Added pending inline comments to Page class #20933
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • use nameof() where possible #21962
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨
  • Fixes KeyboardAutoManagerScroll when using scrollable Editor #21932
    community ✨
  • Android mipmap/appicon failing with "APT2260" #21838
    area/single project ☝️, platform/android 🤖
  • [iOS] Apply contentInsets for any entry/editor in a scrollview #21807
    platform/iOS 🍎, control-entry, layout-scrollview
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Entity cannot be tracked because another instance with the same key value is already being tracked for optional relationships are not automatically deleted #33610
  • Don't repeat joins when using multiple Selects in a custom projection on the same entity #33608
  • Combining using OrderBy on property that was resolved using ternary operator. #33607
  • Issue with retrieving migrations in Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Tools 8.0.1 and above #33606
  • Discriminator columns are created in Snapshot for wrongly configured TPC mapping strategy #33605
  • Migrations: Inconsistency between migration and Script-DbContext when adding a required string property. #33604
  • Many-To-Many relation migration generated more Id & Foreign Key #33603

Closed

  • Test ordering issue #33590
  • System.AccessViolationException: Attempted to read or write protected memory. #33596
  • Query optimization issue when using interceptors that filter Nullable<> fields #33599
  • Error "Object reference not set to an instance of an object." when using .ToJson in MySql.EntityFrameworkCore 8.0.0 #33602

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove temporary properties created by ForeignKeyPropertyDiscoveryConvention if they aren't used. #33611

Merged

  • [SMALL/TEST ONLY] Fix to #33590 - Test ordering issue #33609
  • disabling flaky cosmos test #33601

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-24
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Ordering of PlatformAssemblyPaths passed to crossgen is wrong #6877

PullRequests

Merged
